topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1 Alpha: Verifying the VSC VMs

bodydiv.p: After installing HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, you can use the following commands to verify that LDAP is functioning correctly.

section.title: Verify the VSC VMs
section.p: The installation process creates virtual machines for VSC. Use the following steps to verify that the VSC VMs are installed and are operational:

ol.li: SSH to your VSC VM from lifecycle manager host using the DCM IP. The default username and password: admin/admin
Execute the following command: admin display-config
Execute the following commands to verify the VMs are active: show vswitch-controller vsd show vswitch-controller xmpp-server ping router "management" <vsd IP or domain name>

bodydiv.p: If all these test pass to your satisfaction, the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade installation is complete. To learn more information about using HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, see the Administrator Guide.
